description: A Flutter application main entry point defining the app's widget tree with a scaffold showing a progress message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage managing widget build.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the app with MyApp as root.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState constructing widget trees.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
